project.title: GPLv3
project.description: During 2006, there is a year-long public consultation process for the purpose of drafting version 3 of the GNU General Public License. This license, commonly called "the GPL", is by far the most used license for Free Software. Free Software Foundation Europe is assisting that consultation process by building awareness about the GPL, helping people to participate in the process, spreading information to enable others to build awareness, and organising conferences.
